articles.author: Iain Todd
articles.title: Bepi Colombo captures amazing images of Mercury during close flyby - Sky at Night Magazine
articles.description: The European spacecraft reveals the innermost planet's rocky features in a new series of images.
articles.content:
Spectacular new images of the planet Mercury have been released by the European Space Agency, captured by the Bepi Colombo spacecraft.
Bepi Colombo launched in October 2018 and is currently studying… [+3623 chars]

articles.description: According to recent research, as European birds migrate to cooler regions to avoid rising temperatures, they meet obstacles that slow them down.
